src:
Gruzijac MVP šestog kola Evrolige
02 Nov 2019, 13:22 by Milos
Kompletirano je šesto kolo Evrolige, a za najkorisnijeg igrača ove runde proglašen je košarkaš Baskonije Tornike Šengelija.
Sjajni Gruzijac je u pobedi španskog predstavnika nad minhenskim Bajernom rezultatom 93:60, ostvario učinak od 19 koševa, tri skoka i dve asistencije, za ukupan indeks korisnosti od 28 poena.
Bolji indeks imao je Šejn Larkin iz Anadolu Efesa (30 poena), ali je turski klub poražen od Panatinaikosa, pa je priznanje po drugi put ove sezone otišlo u ruke Šengelije.
Najefikasniji igrač kola bio je Nando De Kolo sa 29 poena u porazu Fenerbahčea od Žalgirisa. Titulu najboljeg skakača podelili su Kris Singlton iz Efesa i Entoni Gil iz Himkija sa po 11 uhvaćenih lopti, dok je prvi asistent kola Nik Kalates iz Panatinaikosa sa 10 uspešnih dodavanja.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Georgian MVP of the sixth round of the Euroleague
02 Nov 2019, 12:22 by Milos
The sixth round of the Euroleague was completed and Basque player Tornike Schengelli was named the most useful player in this round.
The brilliant Georgian, in the victory of the Spanish representative over Munich Bayern 93:60, scored 19 points, three rebounds and two assists, for a total utility index of 28 points.
Shad Larkin of Anadolu Efes (30 points) had a better index, but the Turkish club was defeated by Panatinaikos, so recognition went to Schengelia for the second time this season.
The most efficient player of the round was Nando De Kolo with 29 points in the defeat of Fenerbahce by Zalgiris. The title of best jumper was shared by Kris Singleton of Ephesus and Anthony Gil of Khimki with 11 catches each, while first-rounder Nick Kalates of Panathinaikos with 10 successful passes.
